title: MISSING SUMMONER ICON
body:
I did the Teemoing mini game where you had to sacrifice minions and summon the 'devil Teemo' and i still have not yet received my icon.

When i did the mini game it told my i should receive the icon but i have not yet got it and i have noticed that every one else has it.

can someone please explain to me why I have not received this icon as I'm highly disappointing.

replies.body: Please allow up to two weeks after November 3rd for the Doomed Minion Icon to appear in your account. :)

What about the pumpkin Icon that was supposed to be for gifting? I've gotten the Teemo icon, my ranked icon and even the one for voting  but still no sign of the pumpkin icon. Is this one just very delayed in coming out?
There is a delay, and may take up to the 17th from what I understand. :) Thanks for your patience!
